Text.val: virtuell variables for general use
virtuell variables for tab 1 = attributes
Author : Juergen Paarmann
this porgram contains the online start screen for the debtor heller
17.07.2013 SH SCR18289 Changed event Home to Ctrl+Home (triggered by key)
24.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
15.07.2010 SH SCR15658 Extended ODH001L argument list
31.05.2010 GB SCR15541 Replaced table CLTC by table LTCL (in DB tables)
07.12.2008 GB SCR14175 Changed screen to 1024*768
26.01.2007 SH SCR12135 Changed argument list for program to add new debtor
28.03.2006 SH SCR10687 Added new arguments to program which stores a new debtor
25.08.2004 SH SCR6886 Added user(0) as para for call to BDH007
//19-08-2004 JP SCR #6861 add param in call to new debtor heller
on 28.4.2004 WJ SCR6111 change border style from thick to thin
//07-04-2004 JP SCR #5925 reset TabToken to 1 if page_up_down='' in TS
on 26.3.2004 SCR5778 changed by Jin handle tel event
//25.02.2004 EE SCR5511 page up and down
//24-02-2004 JP SCR #5561 activate new reinsurance handling
//18-11-2003 JP SCR #2413 implement search up/down
//19-01-2003 JP remove call to GM900. Not necessary for this task
//30-01-2004 JP SCR #5256 enable page up/down with var=gv.vcr_on
create new debtor
//close instance of this session
END INIT
END ONLINE
Operation variable = 'F', so SEARCH new debtor heller
SEARCH-EVENT for legal owner or commercial owner
write var to USERINFO
1 online program for tab 1 = attributes
2 online program for tab 2 = archive
3 online program for tab 3 = clients debtor
4 online program for tab 4 = invoice
5 online program for tab 5 = totals
6 online program for tab 6 = requests
7 online program for tab 7 = limit history
8 online program for tab 8 = credit insurance
updates, if ODH is called for the first time
set TAB variables
QUERY FOR LEGAL OR COMMERCIAL OWNER
END QUERY FOR LEGAL OR COMMERCIAL OWNER
DELETE NEW DEBTOR IF THERE IS NO ENTRY
DELETE EXISTING DEBTOR

ItemsList.valUnicode: 1 Attributes,2 Archive,3 Client debtors,4 Invoices,5 Totals,6 Requests,7 Limit history,8 Credit insurance;86,250

Text.val: tab changed
ctrl pressed
exit ODH
